ALARM.TIME_SELECT_ERROR: Please select an alarm start time

APPEARANCE.ALBUMART_CACHE_CLEAR_ERROR: Error clearing albumart cache, please retry in a few minutes.
APPEARANCE.ALBUMART_RESET_CACHE_DOC: The system caches your albumart to improve performance, but this prevents newly added albumart from being shown. By resetting the cache you will be able to see newly added albumart.
APPEARANCE.ARTIST_SORTING_DOC: Choose the metadata used to sort artists
APPEARANCE.COMPILATION_METADATA_DOC: Configure the metadata fields used to describe albumartist in compilations or 'multiple artist' albums, use comma separated fields.
APPEARANCE.IMAGE_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN: Image size must be less than
APPEARANCE.METADATA_IMAGE_DOC: When enabled, if no albumart file can be found in the folder, the system will attempt to extract any albumart embedded in your music files. This will most likely increase albumart loading times.
APPEARANCE.SHOW_TRACKNUMBERS_DOC: Prepend track numbers to tracks title
APPEARANCE.UI_CONFIG_SELECT_LANGUAGE_DOC: Select the Language of your system
APPEARANCE.UI_CONFIG_SELECT_TIMEZONE_DOC: Select the Timezone of your system
APPEARANCE.USER_INTERFACE_LAYOUT_DESIGN_DOC: Select the desired user interface layout design. Contemporary UI offers an experience based on the most popular music players UI. Classic has a 3 tab design, offering a more minimalistic approach
APPEARANCE.WEB_ALBUMART_ENABLE_DOC: Enable retrieval of Album art from Web, if no image is found in the file folder
APPEARANCE.WEB_ALBUMART_SIZE_DOC: Choose the size of Album art downloaded from web: higher quality requires longer load times. Lower values may improve load times.

COMMON.UPDATING_MUSIC_DB_WAIT_MESSAGE: Your music is being scanned and the icon on bottom left will keep spinning until all your library has been successfully indexed. Since the system might be less responsive during this operation, please don't use the system while music is being indexed.
COMMON.ARTIST_NOT_FOUND_IN_YOUR_LIBRARY: Artist not found in your library
COMMON.ALBUM_NOT_FOUND_IN_YOUR_LIBRARY: Album not found in your library

MYVOLUMIO.ENABLE_YOUR_DEVICE_TO_USE_THIS_FUNCTIONA: To use this functionality, please enable MyVolumio on this device from your device list
MYVOLUMIO.FEATURE_NOT_AVAILABLE: Feature not available with current plan
MYVOLUMIO.FEATURE_NOT_AVAILABLE_CURRENT_PLAN: This feature cannot be enabled, since it's not available in your current MyVolumio Plan
MYVOLUMIO.MYVOLUMIO_NOT_ENABLED_ON_DEVICE: MyVolumio is not enabled on this device
MYVOLUMIO.PLAN_REQUIRED: is required to use this functionality
MYVOLUMIO.PLEASE_ENABLE_MY_VOLUMIO: MyVolumio includes support for streaming services such as TIDAL, QOBUZ and  High Res Audio, as well as many additional plugins. In order to gain full access to them, you will need to subscribe a MyVolumio plan. Go to www.myvolumio.org to start a free trial!

NETWORK.AUTOMATIC_IP_DOC: Choose between DHCP and Static IP configuration
NETWORK.DNS_ERROR_INFO: Please fill in both DNS IP addresses properly
NETWORK.ENABLE_CUSTOM_DNS_DOC: Set a custom DNS server, if enabled. This can be useful if your system cannot reach the internet, play webradios or download updates.
NETWORK.ENABLE_HOTSPOT_DOC: The system will start an enabled hotspot automatically if the wireless network is dropped or no wireless network has been configured. Disable the hotspot feature to prevent this happening.
NETWORK.HOTSPOT_CHANNEL_DOC: Change the Hotspot Transmitting channel. This might be useful to improve wireless connection through Hotspot in network-dense environments.
NETWORK.HOTSPOT_FALLBACK_DOC: If enabled, Hotspot will start when Wireless Network connection is lost. If disabled, the unit will keep on trying to reconnect to a known Wireless network.
NETWORK.HOTSPOT_PASSWORD_DOC: Change the default Hotspot Password, use a passphrase of at least 8 characters
NETWORK.HOTSPOT_PW_LENGTH: Hotspot Password must be at least 8 characters long
NETWORK.STATIC_IP_WARNING: Warning, please make sure Static IP Settings are correct. A wrong configuration might render your device unreachable
NETWORK.WIRELESS_ENABLED_DOC: Enable or disable Wireless Networking. This might improve Sound quality of the system.
NETWORK.WIRELESS_NETWORK_CONNECTION_DEFER: The unit will connect to network
NETWORK.WIRELESS_NETWORK_CONNECTION_DEFER2: when first setup will be completed.
NETWORK.WIRELESS_NETWORK_CONNECTION_ERROR_PROCEE: Please retry or proceed to next step
NETWORK.WIRELESS_NETWORK_RESTART_AFTER_CONNECTIO: You will now be disconnected. Please connect back to your Wireless Network and discover your device again, once connection has been established

NETWORKFS.ALIAS_DOC: Choose an Alias that will be displayed in NAS Mounts
NETWORKFS.ERROR_PATH_UNDEFINED: Please provide Share Name or Path

PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.ADVANCED_DAC_DSP_OPTIONS_DOC: These tweaks can enable particular DSP options, available only on some I2S DACs
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.AUDIO_BUFFER_SIZE_DOC: This specifies the size of the audio buffer. Increase it to avoid chances of audio stuttering over Network.
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.AUDIO_RESAMPLING_DOC: This settings controls Audio Resampling options. For local file playback only (does not apply to Shairport and Third Party services like ROON).
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.BUFFER_BEFORE_PLAY_DOC: This specifies how much of the audio buffer should be filled before playing a track. Try increasing this if you hear skipping when manually changing songs.
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.CONNECT_OUTPUT_DEVICE_2: to the unit or select a different output device from playback options
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.DEFAULT_STARTUP_VOLUME_DOC: This is the default volume that is set at system startup
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.DSD_AUTO_VOLUME_DOC: DSD Requires volume to be set to 100, if enabled when DSD is playing Volume will be automatically set to 100 (WARNING: Set with caution!)
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.DSD_DOC: Choose the DSD Playback mode: Direct DSD Playback plays DSD Native on supported hardware, if DSD is not supported by your DAC then DSD is converted on-the-fly to PCM. With DoP (DSD over PCM), DSD streams will be encapsulated in 24 bits PCM (as per DoP Standard).
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.DSP_PROGRAM_REBOOT: In order to activate this DSP Program, a reboot is required
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.EXTENDED_FILE_FORMAT_SUPPORT_DOC: This setting controls the ability to read a wide variety of Audio formats, however it might slow down the creation of the music library database. If disabled, the system will still read most of music formats and Music Library scanning will be much faster.
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.I2S_DAC_ACTIVATED_MESSAGE: has been enabled, restart the system for changes to take effect
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.I2S_DAC_DEACTIVATED_MESSAGE: has been disabled, restart the system for changes to take effect
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.ISO_PLAYBACK_DOC: Use an experimental MPD version which allows ISO Files playback. You will lose DSD direct capabilities when enabled.
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.MAX_VOLUME_LEVEL_DOC: Sets a maximum volume for the system
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.MIXER_CONTROL_NAME_DOC: Change the mixer control, useful when your Audio device has more volume controls. Default values are usually fine, change only if your volume level does not change after an action on the UI.
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.MIXER_TYPE_DOC: Select the Mixer Type: None = No volume control, Software = Volume control but loss of Audio Quality, Hardware = Best of both worlds, provides ability to change volume without loss of quality
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.MPD_VOLUME_DOC: Allow MPD Clients to change Volume, this will negatively impact Volume change speed
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.NO_OUTPUT_DEVICE_MESSAGE: Please connect an Audio Output Device to the Unit
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.ONE_CLICK_VOLUME_STEPS_DOC: Sets the volume difference for single clicks on + and - volume buttons
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.OUTPUT_DEVICE_DOC: Select the Audio Output Device from the ones available in your system
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.OUTPUT_DEVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE: The selected output device is not available
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.PERSISTENT_QUEUE_DOC: If enabled the Playqueue will be retained post reboot, if disabled the play queue will be cleared at every system start
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.PLAYBACK_MODE_DOC: You can select the playback Behaviour: Continuous will add to your current queue all the songs in an album or a playlist, single will only add to queue the song you selected to play
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.RESAMPLING_ALG_DOC: This setting allows to set the ideal Resampling algorithm quality. Higher quality requires greater computing power, therefore sound might stutter or pause on low power devices. If that's the case, lower the quality until you get smooth playback.
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.VOLUME_CURVE_MODE_DOC: Natural (Logarithmic) is how most people perceive Volume variations. Don't change it unless the volume curve is too steep in your system
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.VOLUME_NORMALIZATION_DOC: If turned On Volumio will normalize the volume of tracks as they play. This might reduce sound quality.
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.SQ_FLAC_HIRES_96: FLAC Hi-Res 24 bit up to 96 kHz
PLAYBACK_OPTIONS.SQ_FLAC_HIRES_192: FLAC Hi-Res 24 bit up to 192 kHz

PLUGINS.CHECKING_DEPENDENCIES: Checking that the plugin is suitable for this version of Volumio
PLUGINS.CONFIRM_PLUGIN_INSTALL_WARNING_MESSAGE: Warning, community plugins are developed by third party developers and might result in unexpected behaviours and system instabilitiy. Are you sure you want to install this plugin?
PLUGINS.PLUGIN_LOGIN_MESSAGE: To access the plugins store you need to login to MyVolumio
PLUGINS.CONFIRM_PLUGIN_UNINSTALL_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to uninstall this Plugin?
PLUGINS.ENABLE_PLUGIN_NOW_QUESTION: Do you want to enable the plugin now?
PLUGINS.PLUGIN_INSTALL_ERROR_OCCURRED: An error occurred while installing the plugin
PLUGINS.PLUGIN_START_ERROR: This plugin is failing to start. Please install updated version, or contact plugin developer
PLUGINS.PLUGIN_UNINSTALL_ERROR_OCCURRED: An error occurred while uninstalling the plugin
PLUGINS.PLUGIN_UPDATE_ERROR_OCCURRED: An error occurred while updating the plugin

SYSTEM.ALLOW_UI_STATISTICS_DOC: Allow the collection of behavioral and usage statistics on Volumio UI. These data are used to improve Volumio user experience. For further information about how we collect and process data please refer to volumio.com/privacy-policy
SYSTEM.CHECK_UPDATES_DESCR: Check if a newer version of the system is available
SYSTEM.DELETE_USER_DATA_DESCR: Delete all your settings and data
SYSTEM.DELETE_USER_DATA_MESSAGE: This will delete all your personal settings, favorites and playlists (USB and NAS music won't be deleted). The system will automatically restart once data has been deleted. Do you want to continue?
SYSTEM.FACTORY_RESET_DESCR: Reset your System to factory Settings
SYSTEM.FACTORY_RESET_MESSAGE: This will reset your device to factory settings, all your settings will be lost. The system will automatically restart once reset. Do you want to continue?
SYSTEM.FULL_SETTINGS_SET_EXTENDED: I want the full set of options
SYSTEM.HDMI_UI_DOC: Show User Interface via HDMI Video Output. WARNING: This will degrade system performance.
SYSTEM.INSTALLING_TO_DISK_ERROR_TARGET_SIZE: Cannot install on this Disk: destination Disk must be bigger than source disk
SYSTEM.INSTALLING_TO_DISK_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: In order to use your newly installed system, restart the system and remove any removable media
SYSTEM.INSTALL_TO_DISK_MESSAGE: Confirm you want to Install Volumio on Disk
SYSTEM.INSTALL_TO_DISK_MESSAGE_WARNING: . WARNING: Be careful to select the correct destination disk, as all data on it will be deleted!
SYSTEM.KEEP_PRESSED_TO_TURN_OFF_IN: Keep pressed to turn off in
SYSTEM.PLAYER_NAME_DOC: This is the name of your system as it will appear on your network
SYSTEM.SHOW_ADVANCED_SETTINGS_DOC: When enabled, the system will show some advanced settings to allow advanced tweakings. These settings should be operated by experts only
SYSTEM.SIMPLE_SETTINGS_SET_EXTENDED: I want a simplified set of options
SYSTEM.STARTUP_SOUND_DOC: Enable or disable the Startup Sound, which notifies that the system has successfully started and is ready to play
SYSTEM.SYSTEM_INTEGRITY_CHECK_FAILED: System Software Integrity check failed, manually edited files were detected. System Software Update is not possible under these circumstances. Please execute a Factory Reset or Delete User Data, then retry.
SYSTEM.UPDATE_ALREADY_LATEST_VERSION: You're already on the latest version
SYSTEM.AUTOMATIC_UPDATES_DOC: Enable automatic updates. Please make sure your timezone is correctly configured.
SYSTEM.HDMI_ARC_AUTOSWITCH_DOC: If enabled, when the TV is turned on, the system will automatically switch to the HDMI eARC/ARC input. If disabled, the system will keep playing on the last selected input.
SYSTEM.LED_BRIGHTNESS_DOC: Set the brightness of the LED on the front panel
SYSTEM.AUTO_STANDBY_DOC: Enable or disable the Auto Standby feature. When enabled, the system will automatically turn off after a period of inactivity
SYSTEM.STANDBY_TIMEOUT_DOC: Set the time after which the system will automatically go into standby mode
SYSTEM.AUTO_POWER_ON_DOC: Enable or disable the Auto Power On feature. When enabled, the system will automatically turn on when power is applied or after a power failure

UPDATER.ERROR_UPDATE_FAILED: Error: update failed, please restart system and try again

WEBRADIO.SHOUTCAST_ERROR: An error occurred while querying SHOUTCAST

WIZARD.DEVICE_SUCCESSFULLY_CONFIGURED: has been configured and is ready to play
WIZARD.PLEASE_DONATE: If you like Volumio please consider donating. You can make a difference for this project!

PLUGIN_CDCONTROLLER.RIP_IN_PROGRESS_MESSAGE: This CD is currently being copied, and cannot be accessed until the copy operation has completed
PLUGIN_CDCONTROLLER.CD_RIP_STARTED: CD Rip started, this may take up to 30 minutes. You will be notified on RIP termination
PLUGIN_CDCONTROLLER.RIP_MESSAGE: Review CD Informations and select the desired location for the music files. Once done, click Rip to start copying your CD in lossless format. You'll be notified once the process is finished
PLUGIN_CDCONTROLLER.RIP_LOCATION_MESSAGE_NO_SPACE: There is no space available for ripping, please connect a different drive to save music files

PLUGIN_TIDAL.TIDAL_CONNECT_DESC: Access music from TIDAL in Volumio.
PLUGIN_TIDAL.TIDAL_LOGOUT_DESC: This device is connected to TIDAL. You can disconnect by clicking the Logout button.
PLUGIN_TIDAL.MQA_DESCR: MQA will play back on any device to deliver higher than CD-quality. When paired with an MQA decoder, the MQA file reveals the original master recording.

PLUGIN_QOBUZ.QOBUZ_CONNECT_DESC: Access music from QOBUZ in Volumio.
PLUGIN_QOBUZ.QOBUZ_LOGOUT_DESC: This device is connected to QOBUZ. You can disconnect by clicking the Logout button.
PLUGIN_QOBUZ.QOBUZ_FREE_TRIAL_DESC: Get 1 month free trial of QOBUZ HIFI (worth 19,99€)
